data.lyric:
[ti:Drowns the Whiskey]
[ar:Jason Aldean/Miranda Lambert]
[al:Rearview Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.04]Drowns the Whiskey - Jason Aldean (杰森·阿尔丁)/Miranda Lambert (米兰达·兰伯特)
[00:01.34]Written by：Josh Thompson/Jeff Middleton/Brandon Kinney
[00:02.28]
[00:18.16]Jason Aldean：
[00:19.37]All the folks down in Lynchburg Tennessee
[00:24.56]Been working hard for good ol' boys like me
[00:30.08]I don't wanna be the one to tell 'em
[00:32.56]
[00:33.12]That stuff that they've been selling
[00:35.14]
[00:36.05]Ain't working like it should
[00:37.81]
[00:38.41]But I d**n sure wish it would
[00:40.36]Both：
[00:41.03]Whiskey's supposed to drown the memory
[00:43.57]
[00:46.01]I've gone from one to one too many
[00:48.98]
[00:51.87]And the thing that really gets me
[00:55.11]
[00:56.90]Is how your memory drowns the whiskey
[01:00.01]
[01:03.06]Maybe it's the bar or the stool I'm on
[01:07.19]
[01:08.15]Maybe it's the band and the sad old song
[01:12.63]
[01:13.54]That keeps me buying rounds
[01:15.16]
[01:15.89]That keeps me turning down
[01:17.91]
[01:18.52]Any girl that wants to dance
[01:20.34]
[01:20.96]And you ain't giving them a chance
[01:23.51]Whiskey's supposed to drown the memory
[01:26.50]
[01:28.73]I've gone from one to one too many
[01:31.66]
[01:34.54]And the thing that really gets me
[01:37.76]
[01:39.58]Is how your memory drowns the whiskey
[01:42.72]
[01:57.04]Girl I don't have the proof that 80 proof
[02:01.51]
[02:02.50]Ain't got a shot at touching you
[02:06.87]
[02:08.73]But whiskey's supposed to drown the memory
[02:11.79]
[02:14.02]I've gone from one to one too many
[02:16.95]
[02:19.54]And the thing that really gets me
[02:23.10]
[02:24.90]Is whiskey's supposed to drown the memory
[02:27.82]
[02:29.98]I've gone from one to one too many
[02:33.07]
[02:35.78]And the thing that really gets me
[02:39.08]
[02:40.90]Is how your memory drowns the whiskey
[02:44.15]
[02:46.31]Yeah the thing that really gets me
[02:49.93]
[02:51.58]Is how your memory drowns the whiskey
[02:54.74]
[03:02.35]All the folks down in Lynchburg Tennessee
[03:07.28]Been working hard for good old boys like me
